## Darryn Peterson Shines Bright in Kansas' Thrilling Win
### Executive Summary
In a highly anticipated matchup between two top-ranked teams, No. 14 Kansas took down No. 13 BYU with a score of 90-82. Darryn Peterson was the star of the show, particularly in the first half, before missing a significant portion of the second half. Despite his limited playing time in the latter half, Peterson's impact was undeniable, and his team's victory was a testament to their resilience and depth.

## The Peterson Show: A First-Half Masterclass
Darryn Peterson put on a show in the first half, dazzling the crowd with his impressive skills and leading his team to a strong start. His performance was marked by exceptional shooting, clever ball handling, and tenacious defense. As the game progressed, it became clear that Peterson was the driving force behind Kansas' success, and his teammates fed off his energy and momentum.
